textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   Any help appreciated! I've done a bit of searching, but haven't be able to come up with what this mount is called; something i obviously need to know so i can see if there's an adapter available to mount this on the NEX. As can be seen in one of the photos in the eBay listing, the mount has the three flanges typical of many 35mm-camera mounts. The overall diameter, though, is smaller.
